name: Detective Spade
description:
In a world where gardening equipment are sentient, comes a story of a detective digging for the truth of a murder. He must investigate five areas filled with clues and people to interact with. In the end will you help detective Spade find the true killer and their motive? Or will detective Spade need to hang his tie up for failing to solve the crime.

Detective Spade is made for the New Mexico Game Jam 2019 where the theme was “digging.”

Credits:

Director, levels, models, voice acting, programing, animation : Drew Sander

Levels, textures: Jiovanni Gonzalez

Models, animations, voice acting: Mike Huseman

Story, voice acting, level, audio management: Zabdiel Avila

Models: Gerardo Contreras

Voice acting: Austin Boley

Voice acting: Bethany Coletti

Voice acting: Michael Osborne
